You should make him review weapons from payday 2

I can't help but feel that we willfully ignored discussing that there are NO SEPARATE RELOAD ANIMATIONS for weapons that still have a round in the chamber. Speaking from the perspective of a first person animator/nerd/someone who thoroughly enjoys immersion, I can't help but think that this held the game back in a real way. I even messaged Turtle Rock and WB at various points throughout development to at least consider adding separate reloads for some of the more iconic weapons but...no answer whatsoever. Still hoping this will be delivered in the form of DLC at some point.
I know it’s not first person, but I’d love to see him review Synthetik
Would love to See Jon Look over some of the Weapons within Destiny (yes some of the weapons can be Sci FI Some using Liquid, battery as ammo)
I've gotten way more enjoyment out of this series than I expected to... excellent work!
